class.name: Annotation Plugin
class.description: A Python GUI plugin for annotating image regions

qtgui.label: Label Annotation
qtgui.statustip: Annotate regions in images and write the result to disk.

class.name: Annotation Testset Plugin
class.description: A Python GUI plugin for annotating testset image regions

qtgui.label: Label Annotation
qtgui.statustip: Annotate regions in images and write the result to disk.

class.name: Test Plugin
class.description: A Python GUI plugin for testing the image_recognition_msgs interface

qtgui.label: Image recognition test
qtgui.statustip: Test image recognition using an sensor_msgs/Image input feed.

class.name: Detect Plugin
class.description: A Python GUI plugin for testing tensorflow detection

qtgui.label: Object detection test
qtgui.statustip: Test object detection using an sensor_msgs/Image input feed.
